long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gmail, but fewer shades of blue. Take back your focus with MonoMail.

If your job involves using Gmail all day, you absolutely NEED this Gmail theme manager.

Many of you are unhappy with Gmail's new design. Too many shades of blue, confusing color hierarchy, jarring on the eyes.

We provide you a simple extension to add a monochrome theme to you Gmail experience. Easy on the eyes. Minimalistic elegance.

Too many jarring colors are not only bad for your eyes but also for your focus. If you are serious about your focus, you need to minimize the dopamine optimized lasers shooting into your retinas. Save that for your actual work.

We will add more themes as requested. To request more themes, you can contact info@lasalida.io
